meanings.definition: A labyrinthodont is an extinct group of amphibians with labyrinthine tooth structure.
meanings.sent1: The museum had a fascinating exhibit on labyrinthodonts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of labyrinthodonts to learn more about ancient amphibians.
meanings.sent3: Why did the labyrinthodont go to the dentist? To get its labyrinthine teeth checked!
meanings.sent4: The labyrinthodont's tooth structure was as intricate as a maze.
meanings.sent5: In my dream, I encountered a giant labyrinthodont with teeth like a puzzle.

meanings.definition: Labyrinthodont can refer to any member of the group Labyrinthodontia.
meanings.sent1: The book explained the different species of labyrinthodonts in detail.
meanings.sent2: Labyrinthodontia is the scientific name for the group that includes all labyrinthodonts.
meanings.sent3: The labyrinthodonts gathered for a family reunion in the ancient swamp.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a proud member of the labyrinthodont family.
meanings.sent5: The labyrinthodontia exhibit at the museum showcased the diversity of these creatures.

meanings.definition: Labyrinthodont can also describe the labyrinthine structure of certain teeth.
meanings.sent1: The dentist marveled at the labyrinthodont teeth in the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: The ancient skull displayed the intricate labyrinthodont tooth pattern.
meanings.sent3: The labyrinthodont toothpaste promised to clean even the most complex teeth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as captivating as a labyrinthodont's tooth structure.
meanings.sent5: The maze-like design of the necklace reminded her of labyrinthodont teeth.
